Dvorana popoldne ne sameva
03 Nov 2019, 18:00 by M. Ž.
Mirna Peč - Od začetka novembra veljajo nove cene za uporabo športne dvorane pri Osnovni šoli Toneta Pavčka. Ta je dopoldne na voljo tamkajšnjim učencem, popoldne pa jo na podlagi javnega poziva ponudijo tudi ostalim.
Dvorano so v šolskem letu 2017/2018 koristili štiri domača društva in šest zunanjih uporabnikov, prihodki so znašali nekaj več kot 8800 evrov, v naslednjem šolskem letu pa štiri domača društva in štirje zunanji uporabniki. Čeprav je bilo število manjše, je bila dvorana bolj zasedena, saj so se domača društva odločila za rekreacijo v dvorani namesto v telovadnici ob stari šoli, prav tako je bilo v dvorani organiziranih kar nekaj prireditev, tako da so prihodki znašali nekaj manj kot deset tisočakov.
V tem šolskem letu je dvorana polno zasedena, uporablja jo pet domačih društev in sedem zunanjih uporabnikov, načrtovani prihodki pa so v višini dobrih 15.200 evrov.
Med novostmi v ceniku, ki so ga na nedavni seji potrdili mirnopeški občinski svetniki, je cena uporabe samo za plezalno steno, ta znaša deset evrov na uro brez DDV. Do zdaj je namreč veljalo, da se ob uporabi plezalne stene uporablja oz. zaračuna tudi tista polovica dvorane, na kateri je stena. Ker pa njeni uporabniki ne ovirajo in ne posegajo na vadbeno površino, so na občini, ki je upravljavec športne dvorane, menili, da je smiselno, da se določi cena zgolj za plezalno steno, tistim, ki pa sočasno uporabljajo polovico dvorane, ki se navezuje na steno, pa se najem poceni. Tako bodo lahko v istem času v športni dvorani trije različni uporabniki.
Kar nekaj govora na omenjeni seji je bilo okoli tega, ali bi dvorano med vikendi, ko je manj zasedena, dali na voljo za aktivno praznovanje rojstnih dni otrok. Eni svetniki so menili, da je cena 50 evrov za pet ur najema premalo, drugi so opozorili, da ob praznovanjih navadno prinesejo tudi pijačo in hrano, kar za sabo potegne strošek čiščenja, podan pa je bil tudi predlog, da se za to raje nameni stara telovadnica. Na koncu je župan Andrej Kastelic predlagal, da praznovanja za zdaj izključijo iz cenika in da bodo na občini zadevo še nekoliko preučili.

The hall is not alone this afternoon
03 Nov 2019, 17:00 by M. Ž.
Mirna Peč - From the beginning of November new prices for the use of the gym at the Tone Pavcka Primary School apply. It is open to students there in the morning, and in the afternoon is offered to others as a result of a public invitation.
The auditorium was used by four local societies and six external users in the 2017/2018 school year, with revenues amounting to just over € 8800, and in the following school year by four domestic societies and four external users. Although smaller in number, the hall was more occupied as home associations opted for recreation in the hall instead of the old-school gym, and there were quite a few events organized in the hall, with revenues of just under ten thousand .
This school year, the hall is full, used by five local societies and seven external users, with projected revenues of more than € 15,200.
New to the price list, approved at a recent session by Peace Council councilors, is the price of using only a climbing wall, which amounts to ten euros per hour, excluding VAT. Until now, it was considered that when climbing a wall, it was used or used. he also charges the half of the hall that houses the wall. However, since its users do not interfere with or interfere with the training surface, in the municipality that manages the gym, it was considered appropriate to set a price only for the climbing wall, for those who simultaneously use half of the gym on the wall, however, the rent is cheap. Thus, at the same time, there will be three different users in the gym.
There was quite a bit of talk in the aforementioned session about whether to make the hall available on weekends when it was less busy to actively celebrate the birthdays of children. Some councilors said the price of $ 50 for a five-hour rental was too low, while others said that they usually bring drinks and food at the festivities, which entails a cleaning cost, and a proposal was made to prefer it. an old gym. Finally, Mayor Andrej Kastelic suggested that the celebrations should be excluded from the price list for the time being and that the municipality will look into the matter a little further.
